TopicTitle: Installed Restock and Restock Plus, downloaded the Waterfall configs for it, and my MEM is messed up.

Articles.Content: Have been playing modded without issue up until now.  I installed restock and restock plus, and downloaded the waterfall configs for it, and my M.E.M. is throwing pink (missing) textures for RCS and when I try to enable the pitch/roll/yaw for RCS it will turn itself off automatically the second I try to use the RCS in those axis.  Thoughts?
You got restock AND restock plus WF configs, right? BOTH of them?
